verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: said] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump will discuss " denuclearization " and " durable peace " on the Korean peninsula during their upcoming summit] .
North Korea said Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump [V: will] discuss " denuclearization " and " durable peace " on the Korean peninsula during their upcoming summit .
